RawLine: TNPC_30034003,這兩位是開封鏢局的鏢師，{color=#FF0000}夏人義{/color}大俠跟{color=#FF0000}井人天{/color}大俠。,这两位是开封镖局的镖师，{color=#FF0000}夏人义{/color}大侠跟{color=#FF0000}井人天{/color}大侠。

Items.r: 這兩位是開封鏢局的鏢師，{color=#FF0000}夏人義{/color}大俠跟{color=#FF0000}井人天{/color}大俠。

Items.mt: These two are the darts masters of Kaifeng Darts Board, Xia Ren Yi and Jing Ren Tian.
